task.name: Pipeline Orchestrator
task.description: Orchestrate multi-stage agent pipelines with dependency management

command.name: create
command.description: Create a new pipeline from template or custom definition

step.action: Ask user for pipeline source: 1. Use template (show available templates) 2. Define custom pipeline

check.action: List templates from config: full_sdlc, quick_flow, analysis_only, design_review, test_suite
Copy template stages to new pipeline definition
Ask for stages (agent, parallel, depends_on, outputs)

step.action: Validate pipeline definition (agents exist, dependencies valid)

loop.action: Find stages where: - Status == "pending" AND - All depends_on stages are "completed"

check.if: stage.parallel == true AND multiple queued stages
check.action: Launch agents in parallel using Task tool with run_in_background=true

check.if: stage.parallel == false OR single queued stage
check.action: Launch agent using Task tool with run_in_background=false

loop.action: For parallel stages: Use TaskOutput to collect results
Update stage status based on result (completed/failed)
Update pipeline file with current state

step.action: Send abort signal to running agents
Ask user: Retry failed stages or skip?
